trans-unit.source: Provides settings for maintaining the quota size for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 提供維護隔離儲存區配額大小的設定。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a host application with settings to perform policy decisions in the host's implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供主應用程式以設定主機的實作中的執行原則決策<xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the state that is represented by <see cref="T:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState" /> is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: 確保可在主機上取得 <see cref="T:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState" /> 所代表的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the option for managing isolated storage security.
trans-unit.target: 取得管理隔離儲存區安全性的選項。

trans-unit.source: The option to increase the isolated quota storage size.
trans-unit.target: 增加隔離儲存區配額大小的選項。

trans-unit.source: This property is equal to the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions.IncreaseQuotaForApplication?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value, which is the only value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性相當於<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions.IncreaseQuotaForApplication?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉值，這是在列舉中唯一的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current size of the quota for isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定隔離儲存區目前的配額大小。

trans-unit.source: The current quota size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 目前的配額大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current usage size in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 取得隔離儲存區目前的使用大小。

trans-unit.source: The current usage size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 目前的使用大小，以位元組為單位。
